snippet.title: The Most Anticipated Games of 2013 \- Game Revolution
snippet.description: Our Best of 2012 Awards have finished, and we're already excited for 2013. Yes, this jaded critic is actually excited about something (har har). Not only is the Game Revolution staff ready for the announcement for the next Xbox and PlayStation consoles, but the first three months of ...

snippet.title: Most Anticipated Video Games of 2013 \- Metacritic
snippet.description: Confirmed or highly likely releases. Below, we list the most noteworthy games expected to arrive in 2013. Release dates are provided when known.

snippet.title: 13 Most Anticipated PC Games of E3 2013 | Maximum PC
snippet.description: Dragon Age III: Inquisition: It's been far too long since we last met up with our favorite Dragon Age mainstays, but now it's back into one of BioWare's most engaging worlds.

snippet.title: Top 10 Most Anticipated PC Games of 2013 \- IGN
snippet.description: Top 10 Most Anticipated PC Games of 2013 Our PC editors make their picks.

snippet.title: Game Rant's 15 Most Anticipated Games of 2013
snippet.description: As we close the book on 2012, the games set to be released in 2013 have our full attention. Here's the list of those we most anticipate.

snippet.title: The 25 most anticipated games of 2013 \- CNET
snippet.description: Browse CNET's gallery of the 25 most anticipated games of 2013 to see what the future of interactive entertainment has in store.

snippet.title: Most Anticipated Games of 2013 list - Listal
snippet.description: Release Date: September 17, 2013 Publisher: Rockstar Games Developer: Rockstar North Genre: Action-Adventure, Open World Without question GTA V and BioShock Infinite are by far my most Anticipated games of next year.

snippet.description: There are a ton of great games to look forward to. Here are our favorites.

snippet.description: Most anticipated games of 2013. Here are five video games due out in 2013 that will keep you glued to your couch.

snippet.title: The 100 most anticipated games of 2014 | GamesRadar
snippet.description: But this is only the beginning--we've updated our list of the 100 most anticipated games of the year, and there are some doozies. ... There's been little news on Monolith Soft's upcoming JRPG for the Wii U since its reveal all the way back in January 2013. Forgot this game even existed?
